adjective.description: Relating to or denoting reproduction or propagation achieved by asexual means, either naturally (budding, rhizomes, runners, bulbs, etc.) or artificially (grafting, layering, or taking cuttings)
Relating to vegetation or plant life.
(of a person) alive but comatose and without apparent brain activity or responsiveness.

origin: Late Middle English (in vegetative (sense 2)): from Old French vegetatif, -ive or medieval Latin vegetativus (see vegetate).
